Text: Aymeri de Narbonne:  In the legendary material, as elaborated and expanded in various medieval texts, Aymeri is a knight in the time of Charlemagne's wars with the Saracens after the Battle of Roncevaux Pass.
Triplets:<Aymeri de Narbonne
2:
--------------------
Text: Aymeri de Narbonne:  He is son of Hernaut and the grandson of Garin de Monglane.
Triplets:<Aymeri de Narbonne
